entry.title: WeaveDB - Decentralized NoSQL DB on @ArweaveTeam ⚡️ WeaveDB is a decentralized Firestore, which brings smooth UX, complexity, and scalability to web...
entry.summary: WeaveDB - Decentralized NoSQL DB on @ArweaveTeam ⚡️ WeaveDB is a decentralized Firestore, which brings smooth UX, complexity, and scalability to web3 dapps. Developers can build complex logic for full-stack dapps without writing a smart contract. https://weavedb.mirror.xyz/E4VmonwIP2hV3W3wIum3oFz4giAPzM2E_DeSRLQelL0

entry.summary: RT Josh 👻🌿 | svg.eth Viewing contracts on etherscan is a pain in the arse, so I created a CLI tool to automatically pull any verified contract in your IDE, create you a development environment allowing you to modify, compile and deploy it all within the IDE you love. Enjoy! https://github.com/joshstevens19/evmc

entry.title: RT the luke 🏳️‍🌈: There's no limit to the size you can upload to @ArweaveTeam with @BundlrNetwork. We offer optional event callbacks you can u...
entry.summary: RT the luke 🏳️‍🌈 There's no limit to the size you can upload to @ArweaveTeam with @BundlrNetwork. We offer optional event callbacks you can use to get updated each time a new file "chunk" is uploaded, here I use the callback data to build a progress bar. Seconds later 90MB are on the permaweb.

entry.summary: RT Fuel Labs Our co-founder @IAmNickDodson appeared on the @DDS_HQ podcast to discuss how @SwayLang unlocks a superior developer experience, the origin story of Fuel, and more.
